item.title: Publications
item.description: 2019 Alcohol Brief Interventions 2018/19 2018 Alcohol-Related Hospital Statistics Scotland 2017/18 2015 Potential of faba bean starch for distilled spirit production Enhancing the economic potential of beans using Vicia faba L.: Crop performance and the use of air-classified grain components in animal feeds and brewing 2019 Alcohol Brief Interventions 2018/19 Authors: R Gordon, M Moench Abstract: This release by Information Services Division (ISD) presents the number of Alcohol Brief Interventions (ABIs) delivered in Scotland in 2018/19.
